title: Grace Brown Going All-In on Olympic Glory: ‘I’ll Take Any Medal’
content:
After racing in Tokyo with a broken shoulder, Aussie star is hoping to be healthy and fast in Paris against deep TT field: 'Any four of us can medal. It's hard to say who will come out on top.'

Read the full article at Grace Brown Going All-In on Olympic Glory: ‘I’ll Take Any Medal’ on Velo.
author: ahood
